snippet.title: COLUMNAE: A Past Under Construction — Trailer & Explainer
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD playable demo and support us on: http://moonburntstudio.com/kickstarter


00:00 Teaser Trailer
01:39 Story & Setting
02:16 Gameplay
02:40 Retrocausality


COLUMNAE: A Past Under Construction is a nonlinear point&click adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic steampunk world. The game is currently under development for Windows, Mac and Linux by Belgrade-based Moonburnt Studio. More info: http://moonburntstudio.com

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MoonburntStudio 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/moonburntstudio
Read the Devlog: http://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=48537.40

Video: Moonburnt Studio
Narrators: Paul Currion (Trailer, http://currion.net/), Ben Britton (Explainer, http://www.benbrittonvo.com/)
Music: Moonburnt Studio except Henry Burr - "Stay Down Here Where You Belong"


The following audio samples are slightly modified and used under Creative Commons 0 License (http://goo.gl/EGT6fN): "Vintage Camera Flash Powder and Shutter" by Werra (http://goo.gl/8C3Oct); "Steel Chain Dragged, Hard Reverb" by ani_music (http://goo.gl/ccPn1n); "Running Gear" by Vurca (http://goo.gl/RRJU32); "steam_locomotive_distant" by Heigh-hoo (http://goo.gl/SZh2g9); "angry mob loop" by benjaminharveydesign (http://goo.gl/1E9urb); "crickets" by FreethinkerAnon (http://goo.gl/yi6IhE); "Industrial/Factory Fans" by IanStarGem (http://goo.gl/GpL3ef)

The following audio samples are slightly modified and used under Creative Commons Attribution License (http://goo.gl/lbCHxY): "Big elevator going up" by finalCrystine (http://goo.gl/5N3u5p); "Cricket" by Exomène (http://goo.gl/qnE2Ro); "Loud Machinery Ambiance" by OllieOllie (http://goo.gl/ckKAzj); "machinery-distant-ancient" by nebyoolae (http://goo.gl/sCGfFq); "Wheel Lathe" by Benboncan (http://goo.gl/wypwSb); "Generator #1" by Adam Wayne Gistarb (http://goo.gl/5tddxx); "steam2" by gadzooks (http://goo.gl/k0QxWo); "BirdFlap1" by AgentDD (http://goo.gl/p7Uow2); "Bier einschenken" by mwirth (http://goo.gl/26G1wb); "chain-bike-wheel" by Eelke (http://goo.gl/RhlvXv); "ChainLodingBayDoor01" by mmaruska (http://goo.gl/QojUpn)

The following audio sample is slightly modified and used under Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial License (http://goo.gl/857e8V): "steam_engine - loop" by sound-master (http://goo.gl/IFrhlw)
